headline: NEW RICE KRISPIES TREATS® BLISS RAISES THE 'BAR' ON SALTY-SWEET INDULGENCE
summary: Nothing unlocks childlike joy quite like a Rice Krispies Treats® bar and now the brand is turning up the indulgence with all-new Rice Krispies Treats Bliss bars. For the first time, the iconic marshmallow treat will feature multiple toppings – including a salty snack – to create a delicious multi-textural experience complete with a satisfying crunch. It's a sweet-and-salty match made in snacking heaven.

content.title: NEW RICE KRISPIES TREATS® BLISS RAISES THE 'BAR' ON SALTY-SWEET INDULGENCE
content.summary: Nothing unlocks childlike joy quite like a Rice Krispies Treats® bar and now the brand is turning up the indulgence with all-new Rice Krispies Treats Bliss bars. thumbnail.caption: New Rice Krispies Treats Bliss available in Chocolate Sea Salt Pretzel and Caramel Sea Salt Pretzel offerings
